targets.rawSql:
WITH numberOfCmcdEntriesBySid as (
  select
    count(id) as "cmcdEntries",
    max("createdAt") as "latestCmcdEntry",
    "sid"
    FROM "Cmcds"
    group by "sid"
),
combined as (
  SELECT
    "id" as "ID",
    "deviceSerialNumber" as "NETIO Serial Number",
    "deviceIP" as "NETIO Device IP",
    case
      when "terminatedOn" is null then EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - "createdAt"))
      else null
    end as "Active since (seconds)",
    case
      when "terminatedOn" is not null then EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - "terminatedOn"))
      else null
    end as "Inactive since (seconds)",
    "createdAt" as "Created at",
    "terminatedOn" as "Terminated on",
    "cmcdEntries" as "Number of CMCD entries",
    "latestCmcdEntry" as "Latest CMCD entry"
  FROM "Sessions" LEFT JOIN numberOfCmcdEntriesBySid ON "Sessions"."id" = numberOfCmcdEntriesBySid."sid"
  WHERE "Sessions"."id" = '$sessionID'
  ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
)
select * from combined
SELECT AVG(total_load) FROM "Netios" WHERE session_id = '$sessionID'

SELECT "createdAt", total_load, session_id
FROM "Netios"
WHERE session_id = '$sessionID'
AND "createdAt" between '${__from:date}' and '${__to:date}'

WITH FIRST_CMCD_ENTRY AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN("createdAt") AS MAX_DATE
  FROM "Cmcds"
  WHERE sid = '$sessionID'
),
AVERAGE_LOAD AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE
      WHEN AVG(total_load) IS NULL THEN 100
      ELSE AVG(total_load)
    END AS load
  FROM "Netios"
  WHERE session_id = '$sessionID'
  AND "createdAt" < (SELECT MAX_DATE FROM FIRST_CMCD_ENTRY)
)
SELECT AVERAGE_LOAD.load AS baseload,
"Netios"."createdAt"
FROM "Netios"
JOIN AVERAGE_LOAD ON 1=1

WITH ENERGY_CONSUMPTION AS (
  SELECT "createdAt", total_load, session_id
  FROM "Netios"
  WHERE session_id = '$sessionID'
  AND "createdAt" between '${__from:date}' and '${__to:date}'
),
FIRST_CMCD_ENTRY AS (
    SELECT 
      MIN("createdAt") AS MAX_DATE
    FROM "Cmcds"
    WHERE sid = '$sessionID'
),
AVERAGE_LOAD AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE
      WHEN AVG(total_load) IS NULL THEN 100
      ELSE AVG(total_load)
    END AS load
  FROM "Netios"
  WHERE session_id = '$sessionID'
  AND "createdAt" < (SELECT MAX_DATE FROM FIRST_CMCD_ENTRY)
)
SELECT
  "createdAt",
  total_load - (SELECT load FROM AVERAGE_LOAD) as load_minus_baseload
FROM ENERGY_CONSUMPTION

WITH FIRST_CMCD_ENTRY AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN("createdAt") AS MAX_DATE
  FROM "Cmcds"
  WHERE sid = '$sessionID'
),
AVERAGE_LOAD AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE
      WHEN AVG(total_load) IS NULL THEN 100
      ELSE AVG(total_load)
    END AS load
  FROM "Netios"
  WHERE session_id = '$sessionID'
  AND "createdAt" < (SELECT MAX_DATE FROM FIRST_CMCD_ENTRY)
)
SELECT AVERAGE_LOAD.load AS baseload
FROM AVERAGE_LOAD

WITH FIRST_CMCD_ENTRY AS (
  SELECT 
    MIN("createdAt") AS MAX_DATE
  FROM "Cmcds"
  WHERE sid = '$sessionID'
)
SELECT AVG(total_load) FROM "Netios" WHERE session_id = '$sessionID' AND "createdAt" > (SELECT MAX_DATE FROM FIRST_CMCD_ENTRY)

panels.title: Key CMCD metrics and energy consumption

targets.rawSql: SELECT sid, "createdAt", mtp as "Measured throughput" FROM "Cmcds" WHERE (type = 'video' AND sid = '${sessionID}' AND "createdAt" between '${__from:date}' and '${__to:date}')
